title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not function properly. To rectify this issue, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not provide any response.
EB: The tab key should allow navigation within the Help view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the Help view. 
2. Press the tab key and observe its lack of functionality. 
3. Click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). 
4. Press the tab key again and observe its proper functioning within the Help view.
